title: Korosareru Nara, Isso Sakura No Ki No Shita De
alternative_title: 殺されるなら、いっそ桜の木の下で ; Dead Friend's Love Letter
status: 殺されるなら、いっそ桜の木の下で ; Dead Friend's Love Letter
description:
Description :
        from Sound of Jewels: One day, Yukino received a weird message from her best friend Saho. Then when she came to school she heard about her death. Truth is, she killed herself because she was persecuted by her schoolmates... So why is her last message "run"...?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 4 : I’D Rather Be Killed Under The Cherry Tree
